MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用后使用完每个实例。Call after finished using each instance. 后调用时，释放，用于垃圾回收和应用程序应不再引用。After is called, the is released for garbage collection and should no longer be referenced by the application. 在调用和被释放，则垃圾回收器才能收回内存和资源。After calling and being released, the garbage collector can reclaim the memory and resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 始终调用作为最终的调用来发布每个实例。Always call as the final call to release each instance. 如果不调用，资源是使用不会被释放之前垃圾回收器更高版本调用页面查看器的方法。If is not called, the resources the is using will not be freed until the garbage collector later calls the page viewer's method.

The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是从零开始： 0 是第一页，1 是第二个页上，依次类推。 is zero-based: 0 is the first page, 1 is the second page, and so on. 如果不显示任何内容设置为负数。No content is displayed if is set to a negative number. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
